testcase.classname: Gmail Login and attachment feature test
testcase.name: Login with corrrect user name and password and Compose email with attachment to send an email
testcase.system-out: Given Valid user logs in to Gmail with username and password................passed When User logged in using user name and password navigates to gmail inbox...passed And User need to click on compose email button..............................passed And User need to add text in subject and body of email......................passed And User need to click on add attachment....................................passed And User need to add email reciepient.......................................passed Then User click on send button..............................................passed
